comments:
We have a genmodel file which refers to ecore files from another component which
got moved to a different directory.  When we reloaded the genmodel file in
Eclipse, the reload wizard silently failed when we selected "Next" on the first
page.  An NPE written to the .log file.

There was no indication of the failure in the gui, other than the reload wizard
not moving to the next page.  If you hit "Next" again, it does go to the next
page, but it is all messed up.  This makes it really hard to tell which ecore
files are missing.

Here is the exception in the log.

Created an attachment (id=27162)
Patch that validates GenModel as reload wizard opens it.

Dave, this is one approach for providing better feedback for this problem. 
This is basically reusing the pattern used in the Editor when opening a
.genmodel.
Improved error handling code has been committed to CVS.
*** Bug 113962 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
